/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by tall buildings, their facades painted in shades of beige and gray, reflecting the urban landscape of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Trees line the street, providing a touch of greenery amidst the concrete structures. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
